text.text: ABOUT 2,000 ATHLETES FROM9 COUNTRIESAND REGIONS WILL TAKE PART IN THE FIRSTEAST ASIAN GAMES.
共有9个国家和地区的约2000名运动员参加第一届东亚运动会。
A:How many athletes will take part in the First East Asian Games?
有多少运动员参加第一届东亚运动会?
B:About 2,000 athletes from 9 countries andregions will take part in the First EastAsian Games.
共有9个国家和地区的约2，000名运动员参加第一届东亚运动会。
